reviews.text: Great location. Walking distance to all the must sees in Florence. The staff was very friendly and had great recommendations. They guided us away from the tourist traps and had many great meals. Spa was a great place to unwind after walking around all day.

We only used the spa as we weren’t staying there but it was a great experience. The staff are kind. The facilities are clean. Love all the different rooms to go from hot to cold. The gym is small but is very well equipped and modern.

There are 5 star hotels and then there are 5 star experiences.  Elena and her team make sure that every customer experiences both at this hotel.  They promptly address any concerns or issues that you may have and make sure that you feel like a valued customer before you check out.  The service here has been excellent and tailored to the needs of every guest.  My wife and I were very impressed and the hotel has earned lifetime loyalty on our end every time we’ll come to Florence.

Location was amazing - right in the center.

The staff was very friendly and helpful. Would like to personally thank the concierge Alessandro for going beyond to help in our specific question.

The room was very nice, clean and met our expectations fully.

The only not good thing happened after checkout when the hotel, from my point of view made some incorrect operations with my banking card in terms of pre-authorization and then authorization which in the end led to big problems with a sum of money stuck in hold and cannot still be released.
This led to some budget inconvenience, because we were just at the beginning of our trip to Italy.

Reported this to the hotel, but unfortunately they were not very eager to look thoroughly into what went wrong, though provided their feedback.

This is generally is not a rare occasion with hotels when they treat your bank accounts not they they should and without proper communication with the guest.

We have not stayed at the hotel but visit the spa frequently and it is one of the best places in Florence. Isabella is one of the nicest people at the front desk and they truly take care to pamper you while you enjoy the spa. Highly recommend
